title: Joseph Schultz
brief_description: A young German soldier refuses to fire on a line of Yugoslav partisans. His disobedience costs him his life. Based on an actual event in the Second World War, Joseph Schultz uses both realistic reconstruction and documentary evidence to assert the continuing resonance of resistance.
